mapper.sql: select id, house_id, image_name, image_url, type, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from shf.hse_house_image
mapper.select: where house_id = #{houseId} and type = #{type} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into shf.hse_house_image(house_id, image_name, image_url, type) values(#{houseId},#{imageName},#{imageUrl},#{type})
